wednus.js File Reference

Detailed Description

This opens the root namespace for Wednus platform, 'W'.

What we are doing in this file are:

  • define module loaders
  • implement system/user module libraries
  • open 'W', the *root* namespace for Wednus Platform
  • prepare platform ready

Author:
Sundew H. Shin

Definition in file wednus.js.

Go to the source code of this file.

Variable Documentation

var W
 

Initial value:

 {
    
    c: {},
    
    path: '',
    
    names: '',
    
    events: {},
    
    modules: {'module':[], 'control':[], 'include':[]},
    
    namespaces: {},
    
    check_namespace: function(){}
}
This is the very root of Wednus platform namespace.

Note:
I considered making it a class and prototyping member methods for the class, but I soon realized that establishing a super object and attaching members as its properties is closer to the 'namespace' concept in modern languages. Above all, we only need just one 'W' instance per document in current design anyway.
Todo:
http://www.litotes.demon.co.uk/example_scripts/finalizer.html
Examples:
debug.html, rscript.html, and wednus.html.
